seg.source: Kerber mit Auftakterfolg bei China Open
seg.translation: Kerber with initial success at China Open
Kerber with winning start in China Open
Kerber with opening win at China Open

seg.source: Peking (dpa) - Wimbledonsiegerin Angelique Kerber und Laura Siegemund haben beim Tennis-Turnier in Peking wie zuvor schon Julia Görges die zweite Runde erreicht.
seg.translation: Beijing (dpa) - Wimbledon winner Angelique Kerber and Laura Siegemund have reached the second round in the tennis tournament in Beijing, just as Julia Görges before.
Beijing (dpa) - Wimbledon champion Angelique Kerber and Laura Siegemund have joined Julia Görges in the second round of the tennis tournament in Beijing.
BEIJING (AP) - Wimbledon champion Angelique Kerber and Laura Siegemund have reached the second round of the tennis tournament in Beijing, just as Julia Görges did before.

seg.source: Kerber siegtebei den China Open 6:2, 6:2 gegen die Französin Kristina Mladenovic.
seg.translation: Kerber won 6:2 at the China Open against Frenchwoman Kristina Mladenovic.
Kerber defeated the French player Kristina Mladenovic 6:2, 6:2.
Kerber won 6-2, 6-2 against France's Kristina Mladenovic at the China Open.

seg.source: Nächste Gegnerin der Weltranglisten-Dritten ist entweder Julia Putinzewa aus Kasachsten oder die Spanierin Carla Suárez Navarro.
seg.translation: Next opponent of the world ranking third is either Julia Putinzewa from Kazakhstan or Carla Suárez Navarro from Spain.
The world Number 3's next opponent will be either Julia Putinzewa from Kazakhstan or the Spaniard Carla Suárez Navarro.
The next opponent in the world rankings is either Yulia Putintseva of Kazakhstan or Carla Suárez Navarro of Spain.

seg.source: Siegemund führte 6:3, 4:2 gegen Darja Kassatkina, als die an Nummer 13 gesetzte Russin aufgab.
seg.translation: Siegemund led 6-3, 4-2 against Daria Kassatkina, when the Russian athlete on rank 13 gave up.
Siegemund was leading 6:3, 4:2 against Darya Kassatkina, when the Number 13-seeded Russian retired injured.
Siegemund led 6-3, 4-2 against Darya Kassatkina when the 13th-seeded Russian gave up.

seg.source: Die Schwäbin bekommt es nun mit Anett Kontaveit aus Estland zu tun.
seg.translation: The Swabian will now face Anett Kontaveit from Estonia.
The Swabian player now faces a match against Estonia's Anett Kontaveit.
The sister-in-law now faces Anett Kontaveit of Estonia.
